## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1641c5f88ba5a2747c3768eb890f4e8ec38765b0e706615a116369a1b27e86f8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'statsd-jvm-profiler-dash' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
